altername_name: Sesame Street: Elmo's A-to-Zoo Adventure: The Videogame
name: Sesame Street: Elmo's A-to-Zoo Adventure
overview: In Sesame Street: Elmo's A-to-Zoo Adventure, kids head to the Zoo with Elmo, Zoe and their animal friends, as they explore fun games including letter identification, rhyming, classification, and color and shape identification. Kids can also explore exotic Zoo habitats including the Aquarium, Savanna, Jungle, Wetlands and the Arctic.
